0.title: [stationName] Summer Average Precipitation
0.subTitle: June to August
0.caption: Average annual summer (June to August) precipitation. The lowest (min) and highest (max) precipitation of the month.

1.title: [stationName] Summer Average Precipitation Difference from Baseline
1.caption: Difference between the summer (June-August) seasonal averages and the average for the baseline period, typically 1961 to 1990.
